stepTitle: Train cars are coupled together by being bumped into one another. Suppose two loaded train cars are moving toward one another, the first having a mass of 150,000 kg and a velocity of $$0.300$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$, and the second having a mass of 110,000 kg and a velocity of $$-0.120$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$. (the minus indicates direction of motion). What is their final velocity?
